summary: When you want to fine-tune the rules of who has access to what inside your Tailscale network, the solution is our Access Control Lists, or ACLs.  ACLs are a powerful way to manage access to the resources on your tailnet.  This is a quick getting started guide for those of you who are ACL curious
title: Getting started with Tailscale Access Control Lists

summary:
Courtney Cassidy writes about her experience transitioning out of the tech industry, the joys of gardening, and cultivating space for an intentional life. 

The most important discovery I made, though, was that I could go into the garden feeling unwell after a day spent on the computer, and within twenty minutes I would feel joy and peace.  It was transformative...
title: Growing beyond the computer
